p: The aerial parts of Nepeta baytopii were collected in July 2019 (Genç village, Bingöl, Turkey, 38°43′00′′ N, 40°34′09′′ E, 1055 m). The plant material was authenticated by one of the authors (R.P). Voucher specimens (GP-1082) were deposited in the Bingöl University, Faculty of Agriculture, Bingöl, Turkey. Twenty-five plants were randomly collected in the same population, and they were dried in a dark condition for 10 days.
